Package game

Class YugoMaxx

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.Enemy
        • game.YugoMaxx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable, Skilled, java.lang.Comparable<Actor>
    public class YugoMaxx
extends Enemy
    Class representing a YugoMaxx which is an enemy. Yugo's hitpoints is same as the default hitpoints (50), and damage of intrinsic weapon is twice the default damage (12). It is at least 10 squares away from the rocket on moon and it has an exoskeleton which can only be destroyed with water at 70% chance. It can only be attacked by other actors if its exoskeleton is destroyed. While not standing beside the player, it wanders around the map at random.

                Actor player,
                WaterPistol waterPistol)
        Constructor, that creates a YugoMaxx object with name given, displayChar 'Y' and priority 6, also adds WanderBehaviour to its actionFactories.
        Parameters:
        name - Name to call the YugoMaxx in the UI
        player - The actor that Grunt performs action on
        waterPistol - Water pistol that can be used to destroy Yugo's exoskeleton

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

      • getAllowableActions

        public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor,
                                   java.lang.String direction,
                                   GameMap map)
        Returns a collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to YogoMaxx. If it does not have exoskeleton, the collection contains AttackAction. If it has exoskeleton and the other actor has a filled water pistol, the collection contains SquirtAction. The collection is empty otherwise.
        Overrides:
        getAllowableActions in class Actor
        Parameters:
        otherActor - The Actor that might be performing action on this YugoMaxx
        direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
        map - The current game map containing YugoMaxx and otherActor
        Returns:
        a collection of Actions that can be performed on YugoMaxx
        See Also:
        Actor.getAllowableActions(Actor, String, GameMap)
